question:
The jurisdiction of the CVC extends to which of the following?
1. Members of All India Services.
2. Officers of the rank of Scale V and above in the Public Sector Banks.
3. Officers in Grade D and above in Reserve Bank of India, NABARD and SIDBI.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The jurisdiction of the CVC extends to: (1) Members of All India Services, (2) Officers of the rank of Scale V and above in the Public Sector Banks, (3) Officers in Grade D and above in Reserve Bank of India, NABARD and SIDBI etc.
